rules.natural: If the reactor vessel contains the active ingredient, then the batch of active ingredient is complete.
Either contamination is detected in the active ingredient, or the active ingredient passes quality checks, or the finished product is ready.
Whenever purification of the active ingredient is complete, contamination is not detected in the active ingredient.
Under the condition that the filtration system is engaged, solvent is added to the solvent tank.
Whenever solvent is added to the solvent tank, the agitator motor is actively mixing.
Under the condition that the agitator motor has sufficient power, if the agitator motor is actively mixing, then purification of the active ingredient is complete.
If the transfer pump is ready for transport, then the finished product is ready.
Provided that the transfer line is clear, the transfer pump is ready for transport.
If a blockage is detected in the transfer line, then the transfer line has high pressure.
Either a blockage is detected in the transfer line, or the transfer line is clear.
Under the condition that the reactor vessel is heated to the standard temperature, if the reactor vessel contains the active ingredient, then the finished product is ready.
If the filling machine is ready for packaging, then the finished product is ready.
Provided that the label printer is ready for labeling, the finished product is ready.
If the container hopper supplies containers, then the filling machine is ready for packaging.
Either the container hopper supplies containers, or the label roll supplies labels.
Whenever the label roll supplies labels, the product label is printed.

Either labeling is delayed at the label printer, or if it is not the case that the label roll supplying labels leads to the label printer being ready for labeling, then packaging is delayed at the filling machine.
If an inspection is scheduled at the quality lab, then the inspection at the quality lab is complete.

Either an inspection is scheduled at the quality lab, or if the batch of active ingredient is released, then if it is not the case that the batch being complete leads to the finished product being ready, the batch of active ingredient has failed.
Under the condition that the reactor vessel is cooled to the standard temperature, if the reactor vessel contains the active ingredient, then the finished product is ready.
If the temperature probe has current calibration, then the temperature probe signal is clear.
Either the temperature probe has current calibration, or it has overdue calibration.

Whenever the temperature probe has overdue calibration, if the temperature probe is functional, then if it is not the case that the cooling system being active leads to the reactor vessel being cooled to the standard temperature, the reactor vessel temperature is safe.

Provided that the temperature probe reading is accurate, if the temperature probe is functional, then if it is not the case that the cooling system being active leads to the reactor vessel being cooled to the standard temperature, the reactor vessel temperature is safe.
If the temperature probe connection is secure, then the temperature probe reading is accurate.
Under the condition that the temperature probe has adequate power, the temperature probe connection is secure.
If solvent is removed from the active ingredient, then purification of the active ingredient is complete.
Provided that the heating system has an active heat source, the reactor vessel is heated to the standard temperature.
Either the heating system has an active heat source, or the cooling system is active in the cooling unit.
Either the drain valve has adequate pressure, or it has low pressure.
Provided that the drain valve has low pressure, if the drain valve is open, then if the filtration system is engaged, solvent is removed from the active ingredient.
If the drain valve is clogged, then the drain valve has restricted flow.
Whenever the drain valve seal is leaking, the drain valve is clogged.
Either maintenance is performed on the transfer line, or maintenance is overdue on the transfer line.
If maintenance is overdue on the transfer line, then a blockage is not detected in the transfer line.
Under the condition that the transfer line integrity is confirmed, if maintenance is performed on the transfer line, then a blockage is not detected in the transfer line.
Either testing is completed on the transfer line, or testing is pending on the transfer line.
Provided that testing is pending on the transfer line, if the transfer line passes inspection, then the transfer line integrity is confirmed.
Under the condition that the transfer line pressure test is okay, if testing is completed on the transfer line, then if the transfer line passes inspection, the transfer line integrity is confirmed.
If the transfer line visual inspection is okay, then if testing is completed on the transfer line, then if the transfer line passes inspection, the transfer line integrity is confirmed.
Provided that the transfer line needs recertification, recertification is scheduled for the transfer line.
If the transfer line needs recertification, then it is not the case that recertification is scheduled for the transfer line.
Either the transfer system has an emergency shutdown, or if a blockage is detected in the transfer line, then flow is stopped in the transfer line.
Whenever the transfer pump is primed, the transfer pump has adequate suction.
Either the transfer pump is primed, or it is dry.
If the transfer pump is dry, then the transfer pump is ready for transport.
Either the solvent tank reservoir is full, or it is low.
Under the condition that the solvent tank reservoir is low, if the transfer pump has adequate suction, then the transfer pump is ready for transport.
Provided that the solvent tank level sensor is okay, if the solvent tank reservoir is full, then if the transfer pump has adequate suction, the transfer pump is ready for transport.
Under the condition that the product label is applied to the container, the label printer is ready for labeling.
If the label printer is ready, then if the product label is printed, the product label is applied to the container.
Either the label printer is ready, or it is offline.
If the reactor vessel temperature is safe, then it is not the case that the reactor vessel temperature is critical.
Either packaging of the product batch is complete, or if the label printer is offline, then if the product label is printed, the product label is applied to the container.
Either labeling of the product batch is complete, or packaging of the product batch is not complete.
Whenever a pallet is ready in the shipping area, a shipment is scheduled at the shipping dock.
Either a pallet is ready in the shipping area, or labeling of the product batch is not complete.
Either boxes are supplied to the packaging line, or cartons are supplied to the packaging line.
Provided that cartons are supplied to the packaging line, the label printer is ready for labeling.
Under the condition that the packaging line conveyor is running, the filling machine is actively packaging.
If the packaging line conveyor is stopped, then if boxes are supplied to the packaging line, the filling machine is ready for packaging.
Whenever the conveyor motor is operational, the packaging line conveyor is running.
Either the conveyor motor is operational, or it has failed.
Provided that the reactor vessel temperature is stable, the reactor vessel temperature is safe.
If the conveyor motor has failed, then the packaging line conveyor is stopped.
Whenever it is not the case that the batch being complete leads to the finished product being ready, it is not the case that the batch of active ingredient has failed.
If it is not the case that the temperature probe signal being clear leads to the temperature probe having adequate power, then the temperature probe reading is faulty.

If it is not the case that the drain valve having adequate pressure leads to if the drain valve is open then if the filtration system is engaged solvent is removed from the active ingredient, then the drain valve seal is leaking.
Whenever it is not the case that the cooling system being active leads to the reactor vessel being cooled to the standard temperature, the reactor vessel temperature is critical.
If it is not the case that the cooling system being active leads to the reactor vessel being cooled to the standard temperature, then the reactor vessel temperature is stable.

If it is not the case that either the transfer line certification is valid or the transfer line pressure test is okay or the transfer line visual inspection is okay, then the transfer line needs recertification.
Provided that the solvent tank level sensor is not okay, the solvent tank level sensor is faulty.
If the solvent tank level sensor is not okay, then it is not the case that the solvent tank level sensor is faulty.
